about_the_game:
The SpellForce 3 Mod Kit offers ways to create your own levels and content for SpellForce 3. It contains the level editor used to create the game and the possibility to create content and game logics with the complex scripting interface powered by AngleScript.

It also includes a Debug executable for the game to be able to polish and debug your created content as well as a guide on how to get going with the tools and its possibilities.
